entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
